properties.name: Sweet Village
properties.description: A vibrant village with candy cottages and lollipop trees.

properties.name: Rainbow Meadow
properties.description: A magical meadow with unicorns, butterflies, and a radiant rainbow.

properties.name: Mysterious Chocolate Factory
properties.description: A wondrous factory with chocolate waterfalls and whimsical machinery.

properties.name: Journey through Cupcake Forest
properties.description: A dense forest made of towering cupcakes with frosting-covered trees.

properties.name: Enchanted Tea Party
properties.description: A magical garden with tea sets, cupcakes, and furry friends gathered for a tea party.
